songs.title: Crowded Tub
songs.lyrics:
It's a song for a shitty sad, really bad situation
Little ditty for the man who doesn't think he'll smile no more
I keep bouncin' at the beach and chillin' with the choir of good times
Best I can give you is a little piece of good advice

That's oooooo what did you say and
Heeeeyyyyy what can you do
Ooooo life's tough to play
And Heyyyyy what can you do?
